fields_of_interest: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs
eu_initiatives: Membership of ECVET Users Group; UK ECVET EXpert. Contributor to ECVET Forum and Trans National Cooperation Activities such as the UK led 2017 TCA event "PEARL".
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European Credit for Vocational Education and Training Users' Group#E02251#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2251#Member#C
relevant_communication:
Review of SCQF Handbook, review of impact of sCQFP's RPL tool "My Skills, My Future" and the implementation of this review. Development and delivery of capacity building workshops for ECVET, RPL and SCQF.  
Presenter regionally, nationally and internationally on UK implementation of ECVET within mobility. 
Participation in ESCO orientated project linking SCQF database with EQF portal. 
Member of cross MS team advising the Formerly Known as Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia on implementation of a QF database.
goals__remit: Independent education consultant, mainly dealing with training/ capacity building, quality assurance, national qualification Frameworks (especially SCQF) and ECVET related research and training. I am one of the UK's ECVET Experts.
